translations: 厌恶人类；厌世，愤世嫉俗

sentences.sentence: This childhood led me to a life of misanthropy;
sentences.translation: 童年的阴影使我成为了一个厌世主义者。

sentences.sentence: This childhood led me to a life of misanthropy; I walked the streets, sneering at humans to myself.
sentences.translation: 这使我的童年是厌世的生活，我走在街头，人们嘲笑我自己。
